verses.verse: In the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%>, of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the Medes <S%H4074><s%>, which was made king <S%H4427><s%> over the realm <S%H4438><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>;

In the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign <S%H4427><s%> I Daniel <S%H1840><s%> understood <S%H995><s%> by books <S%H5612><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%>, whereof the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, that he would accomplish <S%H4390><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the desolations <S%H2723><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And I set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> unto the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, to seek <S%H1245><s%> by prayer <S%H8605><s%> and supplications <S%H8469><s%>, with fasting <S%H6685><s%>, and sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>, and ashes <S%H665><s%>:

And I prayed <S%H6419><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, and made my confession <S%H3034><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, O <S%H577><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%>, the great <S%H1419><s%> and dreadful <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, keeping <S%H8104><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> to them that love <S%H157><s%> him <S%H8104><s%>, and to them that keep his commandments <S%H4687><s%>;

We have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and have committed iniquity <S%H5753><s%>, and have done wickedly <S%H7561><s%>, and have rebelled <S%H4775><s%>, even by departing <S%H5493><s%> from your precepts <S%H4687><s%> and from your judgments <S%H4941><s%>:

Neither have we listened <S%H8085><s%> unto your servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, which spoke <S%H1696><s%> in your name <S%H8034><s%> to our kings <S%H4428><s%>, our princes <S%H8269><s%>, and our fathers <S%H1><s%>, and to all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

O Lord <S%H136><s%>, righteousness <S%H6666><s%> belongs unto you <S%H1322><s%>, but unto us confusion of faces <S%H6440><s%>, as at this day <S%H3117><s%>; to the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that are near <S%H7138><s%>, and that are far off <S%H7350><s%>, through all the countries <S%H776><s%> where you have driven <S%H5080><s%> them <S%H4604><s%>, because of their trespass that they have trespassed against you <S%H4603><s%>.

O Lord <S%H136><s%>, to us belongs confusion <S%H1322><s%> of face <S%H6440><s%>, to our kings <S%H4428><s%>, to our princes <S%H8269><s%>, and to our fathers <S%H1><s%>, because we have sinned against you <S%H2398><s%>.
To the Lord <S%H136><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> belong mercies <S%H7356><s%> and forgivenesses <S%H5547><s%>, though we have rebelled against him <S%H4775><s%>;

Neither have we obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his laws <S%H8451><s%>, which he set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us by <S%H3027><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%>.

Yes <S%H3478><s%>, all Israel have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> your law <S%H8451><s%>, even by departing <S%H5493><s%>, that they might not obey <S%H8085><s%> your voice <S%H6963><s%>; therefore the curse <S%H423><s%> is poured <S%H5413><s%> upon us <S%H7621><s%>, and the oath that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, because we have sinned against him <S%H2398><s%>.

And he has confirmed <S%H6965><s%> his words <S%H1697><s%>, which he spoke <S%H1696><s%> against us <S%H8199><s%>, and against our judges that judged <S%H8199><s%> us <S%H935><s%>, by bringing upon us a great <S%H1419><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>: for under the whole heaven <S%H8064><s%> has not been done <S%H6213><s%> as has been done <S%H6213><s%> upon Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

As it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, all this evil <S%H7451><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> upon us <S%H2470><s%>: yet made we not our prayer before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, that we might turn <S%H7725><s%> from our iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, and understand <S%H7919><s%> your truth <S%H571><s%>.

Therefore has the Lord <S%H3068><s%> watched <S%H8245><s%> upon the evil <S%H7451><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> it upon us <S%H3068><s%>: for the Lord our God <S%H430><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all his works <S%H4639><s%> which he does <S%H6213><s%>: for we obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not his voice <S%H6963><s%>.

And now <S%H136><s%>, O Lord our God <S%H430><s%>, that have brought <S%H3318><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and have gotten <S%H6213><s%> you renown <S%H8034><s%>, as at this day <S%H3117><s%>; we have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, we have done wickedly <S%H7561><s%>.

O Lord <S%H136><s%>, according to all your righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, I beg you <S%H639><s%>, let your anger and your fury <S%H2534><s%> be turned away <S%H7725><s%> from your city <S%H5892><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, your holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>: because for our sins <S%H2399><s%>, and for the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%>, Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and your people <S%H5971><s%> are become a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to all that are about us <S%H5439><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H430><s%>, O our God, hear <S%H8085><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>, and his supplications <S%H8469><s%>, and cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> upon your sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> that is desolate <S%H8076><s%>, for the Lord <S%H136><s%>'s sake.

O my God <S%H430><s%>, incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%>; open <S%H6491><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%> our desolations <S%H8074><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> which is called <S%H7121><s%> by your name <S%H8034><s%>: for we do not present <S%H5307><s%> our supplications <S%H8469><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you for our righteousnesses <S%H6666><s%>, but for your great <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%>.

O Lord <S%H136><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%>; O Lord <S%H136><s%>, forgive <S%H5545><s%>; O Lord <S%H136><s%>, listen <S%H7181><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%>; defer <S%H309><s%> not <S%H408><s%>, for your own sake <S%H430><s%>, O my God: for your city <S%H5892><s%> and your people <S%H5971><s%> are called <S%H7121><s%> by your name <S%H8034><s%>.

And while I was speaking <S%H1696><s%>, and praying <S%H6419><s%>, and confessing <S%H3034><s%> my sin <S%H2403><s%> and the sin <S%H2403><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and presenting <S%H5307><s%> my supplication <S%H8467><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> for the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of my God <S%H430><s%>;

Yes <S%H1696><s%>, while I was speaking in prayer <S%H8605><s%>, even the man <S%H376><s%> Gabriel <S%H1403><s%>, whom I had seen <S%H7200><s%> in the vision <S%H2377><s%> at the beginning <S%H8462><s%>, being caused to fly <S%H3286><s%> swiftly <S%H3288><s%>, touched <S%H5060><s%> me about the time <S%H6256><s%> of the evening <S%H6153><s%> oblation <S%H4503><s%>.

And he informed <S%H995><s%> me <S%H1696><s%>, and talked with me <S%H559><s%>, and said, O Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, I am now come forth <S%H3318><s%> to give you skill <S%H7919><s%> and understanding <S%H998><s%>.

At the beginning <S%H8462><s%> of your supplications <S%H8469><s%> the commandment <S%H1697><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%>, and I am come <S%H935><s%> to show <S%H5046><s%> you <S%H2532><s%>; for you are greatly beloved: therefore understand <S%H995><s%> the matter <S%H1697><s%>, and consider <S%H995><s%> the vision <S%H4758><s%>.

Seventy <S%H7657><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> are determined <S%H2852><s%> upon your people <S%H5971><s%> and upon your holy <S%H6944><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, to finish <S%H3607><s%> the transgression <S%H6588><s%>, and to make a end <S%H8552><s%> of sins <S%H2403><s%>, and to make reconciliation <S%H3722><s%> for iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and to bring in <S%H935><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and to seal up <S%H2856><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%> and prophecy <S%H5030><s%>, and to anoint <S%H4886><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> Holy <S%H6944><s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore and understand <S%H7919><s%>, that from the going forth <S%H4161><s%> of the commandment <S%H1697><s%> to restore <S%H7725><s%> and to build <S%H1129><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> unto the Messiah <S%H4899><s%> the Prince <S%H5057><s%> shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%>, and sixty <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%>: the street <S%H7339><s%> shall be built <S%H1129><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>, and the wall <S%H2742><s%>, even in troubled <S%H6695><s%> times <S%H6256><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> shall Messiah <S%H4899><s%> be cut off <S%H3772><s%>, but not for himself <S%H5971><s%>: and the people of the prince <S%H5057><s%> that shall come <S%H935><s%> shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>; and the end <S%H7093><s%> there shall be with a flood <S%H7858><s%>, and unto the end <S%H7093><s%> of the war <S%H4421><s%> desolations <S%H8074><s%> are determined <S%H2782><s%>.

And he shall confirm <S%H1396><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> with many <S%H7227><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> week <S%H7620><s%>: and in the midst <S%H2677><s%> of the week <S%H7620><s%> he shall cause the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and the oblation <S%H4503><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>, and for the overspreading <S%H3671><s%> of abominations <S%H8251><s%> he shall make it desolate <S%H8074><s%>, even until the consummation <S%H3617><s%>, and that determined <S%H2782><s%> shall be poured <S%H5413><s%> upon the desolate <S%H8074><s%>.
